Main Content

CV Realty SUKH DEOL

Sukh is a top rated, highly experienced real estate Agent with over 7 years of experience in Northern California. Sukh has a proven track record of success in helping her clients buy and sell homes. She is known for her expertise in the market, her attention to detail, and her commitment to providing her clients with the best possible service. She also has experience in Probate Sales along with Forclosure Sales. Sukh is passionate about helping people find their dream homes. She takes the time to understand her clients' needs and goals, and she works tirelessly to find the perfect property for them. She is also a great negotiator, and she is always willing to fight for her clients' best interests. If you are looking for a real estate agent who will work hard to get you the best possible deal, then Sukh is the agent for you!
